General.Name: My Humble House Hospitality Management Consulting Co Ltd
General.Description: My Humble House Hospitality Management Consulting Co., Ltd. operates tourism hotels in Taiwan. The company also provides hospitality consulting services. Its property portfolio includes the Sheraton Grand Taipei Hotel, Le Meridien Taipei, and Mu Jiao Xi Hotel. My Humble House Hospitality Management Consulting Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 12, Zhongxiao East Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 100
